meanings.definition: A person who is skilled at a wide range of repairs and maintenance tasks.
meanings.sent1: The handymen fixed the leaky faucet in no time.
meanings.sent2: My neighbor hired handymen to paint her house.
meanings.sent3: The handymen joked about starting a repair business on the moon.
meanings.sent4: The handymen were like wizards, magically fixing everything they touched.
meanings.sent5: I wish I had handymen around all the time to help with household chores.
